page.title: 19GROSMONT GAMES 4
page.content: If one of the dens get blown up we use the other one.We have four guns each. Roby is always getting into trouble. This game has no rules.We all like playing Robots. { Wayne likes to play Fox and {Hounds. } At School we play Fox and Hounds.We have three lives,because the hounds have to catch the fox.There are two foxes and there are as many hounds as we like.Some times we have two dens, because it is easier.We play in the field,because we have to get the fox on the ground but you mustn't hurt him.A hound has one life.The hounds can't get in the foxes' den.Two foxes can beat one hound but the fox can struggle to get away.One den is by the large black gate at the bottom of the field.The other den is a muddy patch of ground in the corner of the field.
